attributes.action: keep the V&A Musical Instrument Gallery open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The V&A have decided to close its long established musical instrument gallery, in effect the de facto National Collection in the absence of an official collection.

Whilst some instrument will be displayed in alternative galleries and others may find their way to the Horniman Museum the majority will cease to be accessible.  

This decision should be overturned and the possibility of a new location, to house the entire collection, be discussed.

Please sign this online petition to express your concern.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
